name: Funny Faces card set [8,9,10.FTC.11]
description: It was so fun combining pattern and imagery to make this series of Funny Faces! I layered antique figure cuts with carefully placed type to make character alterations. The men have different types of facial hair, the kids become like superkids adorned with power headdresses, and the bears sport a badge and crown. Package: sold as a set of three, one in each design Dimensions: 3 ½ in. x 5 ½ in. Method & Materials: relief print and letterpress on FSC certified 100% post-consumer cover weight paper. Colors: men [8.FTC.11]: yellow, red, blue / kids [9.FTC.11]: bright green, dark green, orange / bears [10.FTC.11]: yellow, blue, red. Edition: 80 of each Blue Sparrow Press™ copyright © Heather Smith Jones. Artist maintains copyright, even upon transfer of sale.

name: Rose card set
description: A set of six rose letterpress cards. Please select from the drop down menu the style you would like, or choose the variety to receive two in each design. These all occasion cards are nice to have on hand to send a simple hello, thank you, or special greeting. No. 1- A preppy card in deep pink accented by green leaf edging. No. 2- Antique rose type in orange accented by light blue edging. No. 3- Features a row of antique rose type framed by lines in yellow ochre and red. Package: set of six flat cards with envelopes Dimensions: A2 (4 ¼ in. x 5 ½ in.) Method & Materials: letterpress on 110lb. cotton paper; envelope is cotton fiber. Blue Sparrow Press™ copyright © Heather Smith Jones. Artist maintains copyright, even upon transfer of sale.

name: 4-Bar Sampler No. 1, Collection of five cards
description: A nice little bundle of five handmade cards that makes a great gift. Included in the 4-Bar Sampler are the five pictured cards each with corresponding envelopes. These all occasion cards are great for a simple hello, thank you, or special greeting. Are you purchasing this as a gift? Let me know and I'll wrap the cards in a gift box! Package: sampler of five 4-Bar cards with envelopes including Stripes and squares card, Lines card, Overlapping border card, Wood block color bands card, and the Hello! airplane card Dimensions: each one measures (3 1/2 in. x 4 7/8 in.) folded Method & Materials: collagraph, wood block print, letterpress on cotton and recycled papers. Please see individual card listings for specific info. Colors: varies from card to card Blue Sparrow Press™ copyright © Heather Smith Jones. Artist maintains copyright, even upon transfer of sale.

name: Hand printed wood block card set, no. 2, muted colors
description: A set of five hand printed wood block cards, one of each color, with envelopes. Printed on front and back, blank inside for your message. Package: set of five different cards with envelopes Dimensions: A2 (4 ¼ in. x 5 ½ in.) folded Method & Materials: wood block print on cream cover weight paper that is FSC, carbon neutral, and GreenE certified. Colors: yellow ochre, brick red, dark green, dove grey, and deep blue Edition: 20 Blue Sparrow Press™ copyright © Heather Smith Jones. Artist maintains copyright, even upon transfer of sale.

name: 4-Bar Sampler No. 2, Collection of five cards
description: A bundle of five cheerful cards, including Crisscross stripes and Sunflowers and Daisies. Designs on the front and back are printed using woodblock and collagraph printing methods. Included in the 4-Bar Sampler are the five pictured cards each with corresponding envelopes. These all occasion cards are great for a simple hello, thank you, or special greeting. Are you purchasing this as a gift? Let me know and I'll wrap the cards in a gift box! Package: sampler of five 4-Bar cards with envelopes, including two Crisscross stripes cards and three Sunflowers and Daisies cards. Dimensions: cards measure (3 1/2 in. x 4 7/8 in.), folded Method & Materials: collagraph and wood block print on recycled paper. Blue Sparrow Press™ copyright © Heather Smith Jones. Artist maintains copyright, even upon transfer of sale.
